Question: Dongguan Laifen Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Laifen Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd

Product: High-Speed Hair Dryer (Premium Series)

- Equipped with a 110,000 rpm motor for fast and efficient drying
- Operates at only 59dB to reduce noise
- Lightweight and compact design for portability
- Laifen Wave Electric Toothbrush with next-generation brushing technology
- Exhibited at CES 2023, showcasing high-speed hair dryers and inviting influencer hair fashionista for hair styling demonstrations
- Plans to launch a premium series of new products in 2023
- Focus on providing technological upgrades for global consumers
- Website: https://www.laifentech.com/
